query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS maintenance_tasks (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INTEGER NOT NULL REFERENCES equipment(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  task_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (task_type IN ('inspection', 'oil_change', 'filter_replacement', 'tire_rotation', 'annual_certification', 'engine_overhaul', 'custom')),
  frequency_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL CHECK (frequency_type IN ('hours', 'days', 'months', 'one_time')),
  frequency_value INTEGER NOT NULL,
  last_completed_date TIMESTAMP,
  next_due_date TIMESTAMP,
  is_recurring BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  estimated_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  actual_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  status VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'pending' CHECK (status IN ('pending', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'overdue')),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  is_recurring BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,

  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,

);
